description: Configuration for synthetic market data generation

n_sectors.description: Number of asset sectors to simulate

assets_per_sector.description: Initial number of assets per sector

n_months.description: Number of months to simulate (60 = 5 years)

removal_rate.description: Per-asset monthly removal rate used as the Poisson intensity. Expected number of removals per month = removal_rate * current_universe_size.

addition_rate.description: Per-asset monthly addition rate used as the Poisson intensity. Expected number of additions per month = addition_rate * current_universe_size.

random_seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility. Use different values for different simulations.

index_size.description: Fixed number of constituents in the market-cap weighted index (k).

market_cap_parameters.description: Parameters controlling the shares-outstanding (Pareto) sampler and removal eligibility

cap_pareto_alpha.description: Pareto alpha for shares-outstanding sampler (lower -> heavier tail)

removal_bottom_pct.description: Fraction of smallest names eligible for removal each month

max_stock_weight.description: Optional cap on the maximum weight a single stock can have in the index (0-1). If null or absent, no cap is applied.

sector_volatility.description: Monthly volatility for each sector (annualized / sqrt(12) for monthly equiv.)

sector_drift.description: Monthly sector drift distribution. Drawn per-month per-sector from Uniform(low, high) by default. You may specify global 'low' and 'high' here or add per-sector overrides with the same keys.

output_directory.description: Directory where CSV files will be saved

prices.description: Monthly prices for all tickers (rows: dates, cols: tickers)

weights.description: Market cap weights for all tickers (normalized per month)

market_caps.description: Market cap values for all tickers in dollars
